WorkItem.Description:
After some days I looked at my BiS list for Bears.
I was wondering that items with armor like the neck "Bile-Encrusted Medallion" dropped down very much in the list.
And then i saw it: In 2.3.13 my BiS list had 42444 armor, in 2.3.14 and 2.3.15 the armor is 58528/58550 armor.
Â 
In all three Rawr versions the same file was used.
I disabled all buffs, but the armor was 55440.

Comments.Message: Check the various non-leather items that have armor, and make sure you have them with Bonus Armor, not pure Armor.

ARGHS ok, that was the mistake....

I switched to german translation and updated from armory. An update from wohead fixed the bonus armor problem.

Thx
